servers.name: USA
servers.instructions: Uses SSL/TLS wrapper. Good for bypassing network restrictions.

servers.name: USA - Direct SSH
servers.instructions: Direct connection. Might be blocked on some networks.

servers.name: USA - WebSocket SSL (Port 2096)
servers.instructions: Uses WebSocket over SSL. Best for restrictive firewalls.

tweaks.name: Nati Test Tweak
tweaks.instructions: Uses the default settings from the selected server.

tweaks.name: EthioTel • SNI Tweak
tweaks.instructions: Tip: Toggle Airplane Mode if it fails

tweaks.name: WhatsApp • SNI Tweak
tweaks.instructions: Use to disguise traffic as WhatsApp.
